attributes.action: say no to the proposed construction of the missile defense shield on the soil of the british isles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: recent plans have been discussed for the construction of the missile defense shield on British soil.  This would make Britain a legitimate target for any country wishing to attack the US with ICBM's.  However, the cold war is over and the prime risk now is from rogue states with suitcase bombs.  The missile defense shield cannot protect us from such devices.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
